question: Which country is hosting the 2017 Special Olympics World Winter Games?
explanation: The 12th edition of  Special Olympics World Winter Games has started at Graz and Schladming in  Austria from March 14 and will continue till March 25, 2017. Over 2,600 athletes from 105 nations are taking part in the event.  From India, the team of 89 differently-abled sports persons of the Special Olympics Bharat (SOB) is participating in the competition.  So far, Indian team has won 18 medals in the ongoing 2017 Olympics World Winter Games. The Special Olympics World Games are an international sporting competition for athletes with intellectual disabilities, organized by Special Olympics.
